articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Thai King
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Thai King 
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Bhumibol Adulyadej, king of Thailand, on September 4.
					 The king in his message sent sincere felicitations to Kim Jong Un and sincerely wished him happiness and the DPRK and its people progress and prosperity on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Rwandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Rwandan President
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Rwandan President Paul Kagame on Sept. 5.
					 The president in his message extended sincere and warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of Rwanda and on his own behalf on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 Availing himself of that opportunity, the president reiterated his will to boost the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 He sent highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Sudanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Sudanese President
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of Sudan, on Sept. 9.
					 The Sudanese president in his message said that he was very pleased to send greetings to Kim Jong Un and the peace-loving people of the friendly DPRK on the occasion of its 64th birthday.
					
					 He expressed firm conviction that the DPRK and its people would achieve greater progress and prosperity under the wise, experienced and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He sent highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tanzanian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tanzanian President
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete, president of Tanzania, on Sept. 10.
					 In the message the president of Tanzania sent the most heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of Tanzania and on his own behalf on the occasion of the birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 The president said that Tanzania values the close friendship and cooperation between the two countries and peoples and their warm and friendly relations, expressing belief that the bilateral relations between Tanzania and the DPRK would steadily develop in line with the common idea and purpose in the interests of the two countries and peoples and in conformity with mutual good will and understanding.
					
					 He wholeheartedly wished Kim Jong Un good health and the DPRK and its people peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Felicitations to Kim Jong Un from Dominican President
articles.content:
Felicitations to Kim Jong Un from Dominican President
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Nicholas Liverpool, president of Dominica, on Sept. 5.
					 In the message the Dominican president extended sincere felicitations and wishes to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of Dominica and on his own behalf on September 9, 2012, the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 Availing himself of that opportunity, he hoped for ever-lasting bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 He expressed the hope that the two countries would continue developing the cooperative relations while exchanging mutual views and boosting cooperation in the international arena.
					
					 He heartily wished Kim Jong Un good health and the people of the DPRK prosperity.
					
					 He sent highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits 
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Academy of Sciences led by Vice-President Ri Chol Jin left here Saturday to take part in the 12th World Conference of Academies of Sciences of Developing Countries to be held in China. 
					 A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Paek Yong Ho, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, returned home on the same day after participating in the meetings of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies held in China.
					
					 A delegation of the DPRK led by Kim Mun Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Federation for the Protection of the Disabled of Korea, came back home Saturday after participating in the 14th Paralympics held in London.
					
					 A delegation of the Communist Youth Collectives of Spain led by its General Secretary Juan Nogueira Lopez, a delegation of publishers of Jilin Province of China, a delegation of the Liaoning Provincial Association for International Friendly Contact of China and a delegation of the Library of Yanbian University of China and a delegation of Pugwash Conference on Science and World Affairs which took part in the 8th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair left here on the same day. 
					
					 Departing here earlier were delegations and delegates of foreign countries and international bodies including a delegation of Beijing Foreign Languages University of China, delegation of the Association for Promotion of Development of Chinese Culture, delegation of Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia, delegation of Choson Exchange Association in Singapore, French delegations and delegate and a representative of the Goethe Research Institute of Germany.

articles.title: Ground-breaking Ceremony for Hwanggumphyong EZ Management Board Building Held
articles.content:
Ground-breaking Ceremony for Hwanggumphyong EZ Management Board Building Held
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A ground-breaking ceremony for a building of the management board for the Hwanggumphyong Economic Zone to be jointly developed and run by the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and China, took place on Hwanggumphyong Islet on Saturday.
					Present there were Hong Kil Nam, vice-chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, and officials concerned in the province and Sinuiju City from the DPRK side and Bing Zhigang, vice-governor of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government of China and officials concerned in the province and Dandong City from the Chinese side.
					
					Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					The speakers noted that after leader Kim Jong Il and President Hu Jintao reached an agreement on jointly developing and managing the two economic zones, a series of issues have been settled for the development of the Hwanggumphyong Economic Zone, with a substantial progress made.
					
					They stressed that the joint development and operation of the zone would be conducive to furthering the DPRK-China friendly relations sealed in blood and attaining co-prosperity.
					
					A ground-breaking milestone was erected there.

articles.title: Pyongyang Folk Park Associated with Feats of Servicepersons
articles.content:
Pyongyang Folk Park Associated with Feats of Servicepersons
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Folk Park was recently inaugurated.
					 Built in the area around the ruined Anhak Palace at the foot of Mt. Taesong, the open-air history museum gives a glimpse of the Korean history and the traditional national customs.
					
					 The park is associated with labor feats of servicepersons. To build this park covering an area of hundreds of hectares, they had to carry out more than 270 projects, subdivided into 690.
					
					 Though the construction task was so enormous, the soldier-builders creditably carried it out in the spirit of devotedly implementing the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Under the slogan "Let us take upon ourselves both national defence and socialist construction", the servicepersons accustomed themselves to plastering and other building methods. And they invented more than 100 new construction methods to speed up the projects.
					
					 The soldier-builders finished the construction of hundreds of structures in only four months, including a large-sized Korean map piled up with more than 40 000 cubic meters of earth and a model of the Tower of Juche Idea. They molded about 17 000 blocks by themselves to build a model of the Kumgang Temple Pagoda.
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un visited the park under construction several times, stressing the need to build structures based on historical truth and modern aesthetic taste and indicating the orientation and concrete ways for its construction.
					
					 Kwon Hyong Sik, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said that the credit for the successful construction of the Pyongyang Folk Park, an edifice in the Songun (military-first) era, goes to the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the serviceperson's indomitable spirit.

articles.title: Students of Kim Il Sung University Make Study Tour
articles.content:
Students of Kim Il Sung University Make Study Tour 
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Youth and students in Pyongyang started study tour of the Oun Revolutionary Site on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's guidance to military camping exercises of students of Kim Il Sung University.
					 Students of Kim Il Sung University made the tour on Saturday.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Ryongnam Hill at the university before paying tribute to him.
					
					 They held a meeting before kicking off the march.
					
					 Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University who doubles as minister of Higher Education, called on the students to grasp the greatness of Kim Jong Il through the march and demonstrate their firm will to give steady continuity to the march started on Mt. Paektu under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They left for the revolutionary site.
					
					 After arriving there, they looked round it.
					
					 They went round historic relics, buildings and drill grounds, being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il led the campers to arm themselves with the Workers' Party of Korea's Juche-oriented military idea, theory and combat methods in the days of military camping. 
					
					 They held a poem-reciting meeting.

articles.title: Typhoon-16 to Affect DPRK
articles.content:
Typhoon-16 to Affect DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Typhoon-16 is moving north-northwest of the South Sea of Korea at a speed of 22 kilometers per hour.
					 At 06:00 Saturday the typhoon reached the sea southeast of Okinawa, Japan, at 21.8 degrees north latitude and 129.3 degrees east longitude.
					
					 With 905 hpa in the center, it has a maximum wind speed of 53 meters per second. It has a radius of 240 kilometers with a wind speed of over 25 meters per second and a radius of 600 kilometers with a wind speed of over 15 meters per second.
					
					 The typhoon is likely to reach Ryosu area in South Jolla Province and pass through South Kangwon Province before moving towards the Maritime Territory of Russia through the sea off Chongjin City at around 09:00 of September 18.
					
					 The typhoon is believed to trigger rainfalls in North and South Hwanghae, South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces on Sunday evening and in almost areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on September 17-18, causing wind of over 10 meters per second in the east and west coastal areas for a while and wind of over 15 meters per second in some of them on September 17.
					
					 The precipitation will be 50 to 100 mm on the east coast and areas of South Hwanghae Province, above 150 mm in some of the areas, 40 to 70 mm in Pyongyang City, South Phyongan, North Hwanghae and Ryanggang provinces and 10 to 30 mm in North Phyongan and Jagang provinces.
					
					 It is forecast that the typhoon, on September 17-18, will cause the northeast wind of 15 to 20 meters per second in the East Sea of Korea, with 25 meters per second to the mazimum, generating 4 to 6-meter-high waves and 80 to 120-centimeter-high tidal waves.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Inchon Landing Postponed for Three Days in Korean War
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Inchon Landing Postponed for Three Days in Korean War
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military forces on Saturday are representing in waters off Wolmi Island the Inchon landing operation, which was conducted by the U.S. imperialist troops during the Korean War (1950-1953).
					 In this regard Ju Song Chol, a researcher at the History Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 This is a farce that can be orchestrated only by the pro-American sycophants.
					
					 The Inchon landing operation, praised by the U.S. and the south Korean regime as something like Normandy operation, was a completely failed one in the military point of view.
					
					 The U.S. hurled into the operation hundreds of battleships, about 1 000 warplanes and over 50 000 troops, in a bid to stamp out the main forces of the Korean People's Army. But, the landing was deterred for three days by a KPA coastal artillery company on Wolmi Island, making them take 14 days to reach Seoul.
					
					 The Western media, too, viewed the operation as a failed one in comparison with the forces mobilized in it.
					
					 After the operation, which the south Korean regime praised as one for "national salvation", the U.S. troops killed over 1 300 citizens in Inchon City only in a day, September 16, 1950. Earlier, when they were fleeing southward, attacked by the KPA, they murdered more than 5 000 innocent people in the city.
					
					 Prior to the landing, the commander of the U.N. Forces, MacArthur, instructed the U.S. soldiers to take girls and women as their own when they seized Seoul.
					
					 The New York Times, published in August 2008, disclosed that 43 U.S. fighters dropped 93 napalm bombs on Wolmi Island on September 10, 1950, leaving scores of civilians dead.
					
					 The former attorney general of the U.S. Department of Justice, Ramsey Clark, who was head of an international fact-finding group on GIs' massacres, revealed that the U.S. troops' murder of Koreans became more rampant after their landing in Inchon.
					
					 Such being the facts, the pro-American sycophants set up the statue of MacArthur in south Korea in appreciation of his "feats" in the operation, which deserves to be punished by the entire Korean nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping Up General Advance by Dint of Army-People Unity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping Up General Advance by Dint of Army-People Unity
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The great unity between the army and people in the DPRK is the precious revolutionary legacy bequeathed down by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the biggest pride of Songun Korea. Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially says this.
					 The might of the great unity between the army and people, rare to be seen in other parts of the world, is being fully displayed in the Komdok area, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The army-people unity is the source of the matchless strength and the biggest wealth of the DPRK. 
					
					 In another 100 years of Juche era, too, the might of the great army-people unity is being fully demonstrated. This is the precious fruition of the tested leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 When the army and people pool their strength, there is nothing to be fearful of or impossible to do. 
					
					 The history and tradition of helping the people and assisting the army should be carried forward down through generations. 
					
					 All the fields and units should effectively organize the work of assisting the people's army to make all the families patriotic ones assisting the army. 
					
					 For the present, it is necessary to fully demonstrate the might of the great army-people unity in the rehabilitation drive from flood damage in the Komdok area. 
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche, cause of Songun revolution is invincible and the future of Korea is very bright as there are the tested leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea and the single-minded unity of the army and people boundlessly faithful to the party's cause.

articles.title: U.S. Is Bound to Meet Shameful Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Bound to Meet Shameful Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean people love peace more than others and do not want a war, but the situation on the Korean Peninsula is now inching close to the brink of a war despite the DPRK's peace-loving efforts, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces kicked off large-scale war exercises for aggression by raking up forces following them. The undisguised provocation and challenge have posed a serious threat to the security of Korea.
					
					 Historically the U.S. has pursued the hostile policy toward the DPRK, far from taking the stand of solving problems based on the respect for sovereignty in its persistent bid to topple the social system in the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has remained unchanged in the period of the present administration.
					
					 The U.S. is staging saber-rattling by mobilizing huge forces and modern war equipment enough to fight a war. Included there are units of the U.S. forces, their commanding officers and staff members to be hurled in case of "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. portrays war exercises it wages every year as "annual exercises" and "defense exercises". This is just nonsense to loosen the vigilance of the DPRK and make a surprise attack on it.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' reckless provocations for a war have created the constant tension on the peninsula where a war may break out any moment.
					
					 The military and technological superiorities are no longer the U.S. monopoly.
					
					 If the U.S. misjudges the situation and dares ignite a war against the DPRK, it will suffer disaster incomparable with the defeat it sustained in the past Korean War, the article warns.

articles.title: Intolerable Are S. Korean Conservative Regime's Moves to Stay in Power: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Intolerable Are S. Korean Conservative Regime's Moves to Stay in Power: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea had a secret talk with "Saenuri Party's presidential hopeful" Park Guen Hye at Chongwadae some days ago. This was a product of sordid nexus to avoid the judgment of the people for their treacherous rule and realize the ambition for staying in power.  Rodong Sinmun says this in a bylined article Saturday.
					 The south Korean conservative group's moves for staying in power are intolerable as they signal the continuation of the dead-locked north-south relations and constant danger of war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The conservative group changed the name of the "Grand National Party" into the "Saenuri Party" with the "presidential elections" in mind. It is alluring the people's mindset, crying out for "vamping". Meanwhile, the "Saenuri Party" which had been trying to shift the blame for the failed policies on to Lee, while attempting at "discrimination" against him, is now seeking "great alliance of conservatives", in alignment with him again.
					
					 The regime the "Saenuri Party" is thinking to set up is just a replica of the Lee Myung Bak conservative regime keen on confrontation with the north.
					
					 The collapse of the present north-south relations is attributable to Lee and the "Saenuri Party" that had worked with blood-shot eyes to do harm to fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 If the "Saenuri Party" takes office again, it will be impossible to mend the inter-Korean relations that had been pushed to the lowest ebb nor will it be possible to remove ever-increasing danger of war from the Korean Peninsula. And the south Korean people will never be able to evade from the present sufferings.
					
					No hope should be pinned on the "Saenuri Party" in view of its past crimes and the present deed.

articles.title: Provokers Will Face Bitter Defeat: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Provokers Will Face Bitter Defeat: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- It was belatedly disclosed that the U.S. and south Korean warmongers staged the drill for preemptive attack against the north and "operation for stabilizing the north" called "wind of freedom" during the joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) held in August. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday runs a bylined commentary in this regard. 
					
					 It says: 
					
					 The U.S. military and Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea portrayed UFG as the exercises for "defending" south Korea from the "attack" by the DPRK. But, the disclosed fact proves that it was the shameless deception. 
					
					 When the provocative action was made public to the media, the regime of south Korea upset by it made such poor excuse that "concept of preemptive attack for the right to self-defense" was first applied to UFG. 
					
					 After all, UFG was the typical war drill for invasion the purpose of which was to mount a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK and implant the corrupt "liberal democratic system" into it. 
					
					 It is ridiculous for the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to seek a foolish dream backed by outside forces. 
					
					 Preemptive attack is not a monopoly of invaders. 
					
					 The Korean People's Army has already rounded off the preparations for the final battle in line with the operation plan of the Supreme Command. 
					
					 If the warmongers dare provoke the DPRK, its army and people will deal an annihilating strike at the enemies by venting their pent-up grudges and hatred and win victory in the just sacred war for national reunification. 
					
					 The enemies' preemptive attack on the DPRK will end in their bitter defeat.

articles.title: Minju Joson Raps Outbursts of Confrontation Maniacs in S. Korea
articles.content:
Minju Joson Raps Outbursts of Confrontation Maniacs in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Ryu U Ik, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, on September 12 trumpeted about "normal development of the inter-Korean relations" and the like, asserting that south Korea would pursue "a flexible policy toward the north."
					 Earlier, the vice-minister of Unification of south Korea talked such nonsense at a seminar at the "National Assembly" that "the north's nuclear development and military provocations weakened the public support for the south-north economic cooperation". He even cried out for the "north's sincere attitude".
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a bylined commentary says in this regard:
					
					 What the above-said mandarins uttered is nothing but sophism reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 From the very outset of its office, the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea insisted that dialogue and cooperation are possible only when the north dismantles its nukes and opts for opening in total denial of the north-south declaration and spelled out "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" as its "policy toward the north",  bedeviling the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The action taken by the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent is a self-defensive measure to protect the peace of the country and security of the nation to cope with the moves of the south Korean group of traitors to bedevil the inter-Korean relations and escalate the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have finished their preparations to launch a decisive battle for wiping out the group of traitors at a blow, pursuant to the operational plan of the Supreme Command, if it dares provoke a war.
					
					 The group of traitors is now pretending to be concerned for the issue of reunification. Why? It is its ulterior intention to justify its confrontation policy and shift the responsibility for the collapse of the inter-Korean relations onto the north in a bid to prolong its remaining days, taken aback by the mounting resolution of the army and people of the DPRK to settle accounts with it through a great war for national reunification. 
					
					 With no rhetoric can the Lee group of traitors escape a stern punishment by history, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korea Stages War Drills to Invade DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korea Stages War Drills to Invade DPRK 
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean trigger-happy elements staged combined firing drills of motorized troops and air force units in Phochon, Kyonggi Province on Sept. 13, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 They amassed for the military exercises more than 1 500 troops of 17 units and over 130 military hardware pieces of 15 sorts such as tank, armored car, airplane, MLRS and gunship.
					
					 The south Korean military staged madcap firing drill of various kinds of weapons while recklessly waging offensive operation and shelling exercises of the 7th Corps of the south Korean army, a mobile corps. It, at the same time, let military personnel of different countries and citizens in Kyonggi Province and primary, secondary and high school students observe the drills, fanning up a war hysteria against the north.
					
					 In the meantime, the south Korean 8th corps announced that it would hold a combined counter-infiltration drill in the area of Ryongdong of south Korean Kangwon Province on Sept. 18 and 19.
					
					 All units of the corps and naval and air forces are due to be hurled into the provocative drill which will be held under the pretext of polishing up the joint operation of the three services in the area to cope with someone's "provocation".
					
					 In recent days, the south Korean military has staged more and more war exercises for aggression on the DPRK and the intensity of the drills has increased day by day.
					
					 The ceaseless war exercises by the south Korean bellicose forces are arousing surging indignation of all fellow countrymen and the world peace-loving people.

articles.title: South Headquarters of Pomminryon Accuses S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Pro-Reunification Figure
articles.content:
South Headquarters of Pomminryon Accuses S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Pro-Reunification Figure
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea' Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on Sept. 12 denouncing the south Korean puppet regime for suppressing a pro-reunification figure.
					 The statement recalled that that day the police stormed the house of Han Ki Myong, chairman of the Taegu and North Kyongsang Provincial Federation of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, and searched it, copying the data in his computer and confiscating information and books concerning the activities of the South Headquarters and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification.
					
					 The statement continued: The present "government" brought back the south-north relations to those of confrontation in the past and pushed them to the worst phase. Not content with this, it is working hard to force the pro-reunification figures to fall victims to a repressive campaign launched under the pretext of security though they carried on righteous activities. 
					
					 Lurking behind the authorities' ceaseless crackdown upon the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and pro-reunification figures is a sinister design to create favorable conditions for them to win the forthcoming "presidential" election.
					
					 Such clampdown would only touch off stronger protest among the people from all walks of life and the group of traitors is bound to face a severe punishment in the election, the statement warned.
					
					 It urged the Lee Myung Bak regime to immediately give up its foolish design to stay in power through the suppression of patriotic figures.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration Marked in Japan
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration Marked in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Korean youth and students in Japan and Japanese youth and students held an event in Tokyo on Sept. 9 to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Youth League in Japan, the Council of Young Men's Associations of Japan (Japan Seinendan Council) and the League of Socialist Youth of Japan.
					 A meeting took place prior to it.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting accused the Japanese government of fanning up the hostility toward the DPRK among Japanese, young people in particular, putting media under control, while talking about "the abduction issue" even after the publication of the declaration.
					
					 The strained DPRK-Japan relations and the ban on entry of ship Mangyongbong-92 into a Japanese port made it very difficult for Korean youth and students in Japan to make study tour of their homeland, they added.
					
					 Calling for an early improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations, they urged youth and students of Korea and Japan to take the lead in making positive efforts for the normalization of ties between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 They declared that the young Japanese should have proper understanding of their country's past history and conduct brisk exchange with the Korean youth and students in Japan.
					
					 Then the meeting introduced activities for friendship between youth and students of Korea and Japan over the past decade.
					
					 A joint appeal was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants looked round a photo exhibition and a painting exhibition on the themes of "Pyongyangites" and "Forum of children in the north and the south of Korea and Japanese children".
					
					 There took place a demonstration of young people of Korea and Japan supporting the Pyongyang Declaration and aspiring after the DPRK-Japan friendship.
					
					 An art performance was given by youth and students of Korea and Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Given Publicity in Indonesia, Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Given Publicity in Indonesia, Italy
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was carried by The First Times of Indonesia on Sept. 6.
					 The work, made public on April 20, 2012, clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes. It also indicates the tasks for firmly upholding and eternally glorifying their ideas and feats.
					
					 The full text of his work was posted by the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy on its Internet website on Sept. 8.
					
					 The Indonesian paper also carried a detailed gist of his work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country."
					
					 The work, published on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his life characterized by his love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also clarifies important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Studied in India and Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Studied in India and Italy
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A briefing and seminar on works of the dear respected Kim Jong Un were held in India and Italy on Sept. 2 and 3.
					 Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, made a briefing on the main contents of the work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					
					 He said the work serves as a banner encouraging the Korean people and other progressive people of the world in their struggle to accomplish the cause of global independence as it is an immortal library of the revolutionary careers and exploits of the great leaders of the DPRK.
					
					 While studying his work, I clearly realized the intense loyalty of Marshal Kim Jong Un to carry forward and accomplish the cause of Juche, the Songun revolutionary cause through generations, holding the preceding leaders in high esteem forever, he added.
					
					 Flavio Pettinari, chief of the Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Study Group in Fermo of Italy, recalled that Kim Jong Un published work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" on July 26, 2012.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his work emphasized that leader Kim Jong Il loved the country and its people more ardently than anybody else and referred to the immortal exploits he performed by totally dedicating his life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The work also clarifies important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The Korean people are energetically stepping up the drive for building a thriving nation by displaying Kim Jong Il's patriotism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and reception took place in Pakistan, Malaysia, South Africa and at the Regional Development Office of the FIFA in celebration of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK from Sept. 4 to 7.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos of the feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in nation -building and the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were personages of governments, political parties, and social organizations of relevant countries and the Regional Development Office of the FIFA, diplomatic envoys of various countries and staff members of the DPRK embassies in Malaysia and South Africa and masses.
					
					 Korean films shown included "DPRK's 55th Anniversary" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Pakistan.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Peru posted special write-ups on their Internet websites on the 64th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its Internet homepage on Sept. 3 an article entitled "People's country, socialist Korea" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 It was the view of Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, that if the will and wishes of the people are fully reflected and systematized, they will be ideology, a line and policy, the article said, and went on:
					
					 He shaped policies reflecting the will and wishes of the people and fully realized them even before proclaiming the birth of the DPRK.
					
					 The article gave a detailed account of the fact that the DPRK has consistently pursued popular policies for more than 60 years. 
					
					 It continued:
					
					 A vigorous drive is now under way to build a thriving socialist nation to translate into reality the people's wishes to live well with no more to desire in the world under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The People's Theatre, Rungna People's Pleasure Park and Changjon Street and other monumental edifices and buildings appeared in Pyongyang, the capital of the DPRK, recently.
					
					 The new appearance of Pyongyang is the fruition of the love shown by Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un for the people as they made patriotic devotion for the building of rich and powerful socialist Korea.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted an article "Kim Jong Un's Hot Wind" on its Internet website on Sept. 4.
					
					 The Polish Internet homepage "The DPRK" posted an article entitled "Independent Power" on Sept. 9.

articles.title: DPRK's Day of Songun Marked Worldwide
articles.content:
DPRK's Day of Songun Marked Worldwide
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean people and other progressive people of the world marked with splendor the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 August 25 this year was a more significant holiday as the Korean people marked the day after having the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the highest posts of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army.
					
					 The government of the Brasilia Federal District presented a gift to Kim Jong Un, great successor to the Songun revolutionary cause, and Brena District, Lima City, Peru awarded the title of honorary citizen to him. 
					
					 The third meeting of the Council of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation enlarged and reorganized the International Kim Il Sung Foundation into the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation in order to eternally glorify the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the sun.
					
					 The Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism were renamed Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					 The World Horticultural Expo Venlo 2012 Holland awarded its top prize to Kimjongilia, immortal flower.
					
					 Diverse political and cultural events held in various parts of the world included the Korean culture and arts exhibition in China and the DPRK-Russia Friendship Culture Festival in Russia, meetings, seminars on exploits, book and photo exhibitions and film shows. 
					
					 The events were attended by officials of governments, political parties and social organizations of relevant countries. They expressed deep reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Foreign media gave wide publicity to the glorious history of his Songun revolutionary leadership and the might of Songun.
					
					 The Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea opened a new internet website on the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un and featured the history of his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The speech made by him at the banquet given in celebration of Aug. 25 "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" evoked a lively response worldwide.
					
					 Xinhua News, ITAR-TASS, Cuban TV Broadcasting Service, Asahi Shimbun, the Internet homepage of the Communist Party of Argentina and other media of the world reported about his speech.
					
					 Many political parties and social organizations and figures of various social standings issued statements on his speech.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed by Foreign Broadcasting Services
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed by Foreign Broadcasting Services 
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign radio and TV broadcasting services aired programs congratulating the DPRK on its 64th birthday between Sept. 1 and 9.
					 Equatorial Guinean TV aired four times a special program on the DPRK together with portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The program said:
					
					 The founding of the DPRK by Kim Il Sung on Sept. 9, 1948 was a shining victory of the line of nation-building laid down by him and it marked a historic event which brought about a radical change in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and carving out the destiny of the Korean nation.
					
					 The DPRK covered the path of victory and glory under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and joined all other people of the world in the struggle against domination, interference and war moves and positively contributed to ensuring peace in Asia.
					
					 Syrian Central TV and Radio Broadcasting Services also gave a detailed account of the fact that the DPRK turned into a country of the people and an invincible socialist power.
					
					 The Cambodian State Radio Broadcasting Service said:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is standing at the helm of the DPRK.
					
					 He solemnly declared that the DPRK would invariably keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 F.M. 90.5 Radio and Apsara TV and Radio of Cambodia introduced successes registered by the people of the DPRK in building a rich and powerful nation under the leadership of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Guinean State TV and TV "Tele Andina 23" of Ecuador showed DPRK films such as "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Pyongyang at Night".

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed by Organizations in UK
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed by Organizations in UK 
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made pubic a joint declaration on Sept. 1 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 It said:
					
					 The foundation of the DPRK marked an important event in Juche-based nation-building.
					
					 The DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung on Sept. 9 1948 is the legitimate state reflecting the unanimous will of all Koreans.
					
					 They successfully settled the issue of power, the most essential issue in the revolutionary struggle, under the leadership of the President.
					
					 Its foundation greatly encouraged the world oppressed people groaning due to imperialists' exploitation and put strong spurs to their struggle for national sovereignty and liberation.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the President the DPRK successfully carried out the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution and the socialist revolution, building a popular masses-centered socialist state free from exploitation and oppression.
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK is not a copy of socialism in any other country.
					
					 The country has pursued an independent policy and firmly adhered to the principle of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defense.
					
					 After its founding, the DPRK considered it as the supreme principle governing its state activities to improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 As a result, the country has turned into a land of bliss for the people.
					
					 Under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un the DPRK is making a dynamic advance to build a thriving socialist nation and accomplish the cause of national reunification, foiling all provocations of the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Demanded in Peru
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Demanded in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General  Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute in a joint statement issued on Sept. 8 demanded the pullback of the U.S. troops for aggression from south Korea.
					 The statement recalled that the U.S. imperialists have frantically staged war maneuvers in south Korea for more than six decades to invade the DPRK and the rest of the world.
					
					 The pullback of U.S. troops from south Korea is a prerequisite to the U.S. imperialists' action to roll back their hostile policy toward the DPRK, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to properly understand the might of the DPRK and behave itself.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK having Marshal Kim Jong Un as the Supreme Commander will beat back any aggression by the enemies and win a final victory in the sacred war to reunify the country by dint of the single-minded unity and nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: Russian Paper Carries Russian Writer's Impressions of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Paper Carries Russian Writer's Impressions of DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The 32nd issue of the Russian paper Patriot carried an article written by Russian writer Rabrentsi Gurzhiyev who took part in celebrations of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The article is titled "Tears of joy, 10 days that stirred me."
					
					 The paper carried a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un waving back to columns of the military parade from the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 The writer said in his article that he was deeply moved to see many things in the DPRK while staying there for emotion-charged ten days, adding:
					
					 When we said we would go to Pyongyang, a woman of our delegation was questioned by her friend why she liked to go to the DPRK far away from Russia.
					
					 Hearing this, she answered without hesitation that she wanted to feel in the DPRK that she is also a human being. Because one can hardly feel the real value as a human being in the society based on a bourgeois view on value.
					
					 When watching the military parade held at Kim Il Sung Square we felt tears of joy in our eyes.
					
					 It fully demonstrated before the whole world the invincible might of the Korean People's Army which makes enemies tremble with fear.
					
					 While visiting Kim Il Sung University and others, we once again realized that the level of education is really high in the DPRK and its education policy is advantageous and this country is the eastern one of good manners.
					
					 We keenly felt that the DPRK is the future of mankind. 
					
					 Koreans work hard and firmly defend the sovereignty of their country. They spend their holidays with joy, enjoy arts and love their children. They also feel happy in their life.
					
					 Foreign visitors to the DPRK would learn that the people of this country like songs very much. The musical talents and cultural level of Koreans strike foreigners with admiration.
					
					  Giving his impressions of various parts of Pyongyang he visited, the writer continued:
					
					 We visited the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital where we saw splendid jewel-studded floor. This helped us know well about the noble intention of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 This was done so to make every child born in the world feel the beauty of their beloved motherland.
					
					 This is a legend-like story about the happy people full of national self-respect.
					
					  Nurseries, kindergartens and schoolchildren's palace we visited once again reminded us of Kim Il Sung who said the children are the kings of the country.
					
					 The Korean people have foiled the vicious moves of the imperialists with the might of the Songun policy.
					
					 They never yielded to any trial but made redoubled efforts.
					
					 The Korean people are united close around their party and leader.
					
					 What we felt most keenly while staying in the DPRK is that its people absolutely trust their leaders and remain true to their leadership.
					
					 This never happens of its own accord.
					
					 This unity has been achieved because the great leaders of the Korean people Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il pursued the policy for their people and Kim Jong Un loves his people more than anybody else and devotes his all to them.
					
					 We had the honor of hearing his speech at the square.
					
					 He said that it is the steadfast determination of the Workers' Party of Korea to make the best people in the world who have remained loyal to the party, weathering all sorts of ordeals, fully enjoy prosperity and wealth in the socialist society without tightening their belts again.
					
					 I have never heard from any foreign leaders such words full of boundless love for the people.
					
					 On a trip to this country I happened to meet a person going to Pyongyang from Austria.
					
					 He was the man quite indifferent to the socialist idea. So I could not help asking him why he came to have the idea of going to Pyongyang.
					
					 He answered my question as follows:
					
					 There is something in the DPRK which one can hardly find in any capitalist countries. This is independence. Beautiful landscape and famous spots can be found in any part of the world, but the socialist feeling which makes one live by one's own efforts is marvelous, indeed. That is why I like this country. There are difficulties in the DPRK, too, but the people of this country are weathering all of them cheerfully. For me, all these realities of the DPRK are astonishing and rare, indeed.
					
					 I would like to say something to our readers before concluding my story.
					
					 The Korean people are neither sufficient in everything nor free from hardships but they are optimistic about victory.
					
					 Korean style socialism is the best one and sure to triumph.
					
					 This is the conclusion I have drawn from my Pyongyang visit.

articles.title: Russian Paper Slams Japan's Ambition for Territorial Expansion
articles.content:
Russian Paper Slams Japan's Ambition for Territorial Expansion 
						
 Moscow, September 14 (KCNA) --The Russian paper Nezabisimaya Gazetta carried an article denouncing Japan for its ambition to expand its territory.
					 The paper said:
					
					 Japan has made desperate efforts to persistently rub salt into the wounds of the people who suffered from the Pacific War, far from seriously repenting of the aggression it committed against its neighboring countries in the last century.
					
					 Japan's claim to the Southern Kuriles only reminds those who live in the Far Eastern and Siberian regions of the Imperial Japanese Army who burned people to death during the civil war and attacked bases of the Soviet Army.
					
					 Japan's hysteric reaction to the Russian head of state's visit to Kunarshir Island in November 2010 made the Russian politicians feel that Japan does not recognize the outcome of the Second World War and is seeking to reexamine it whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 It is the view of the countries in the region that the Japanese society is trying hard to discard the guilty conscience of the atrocities committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past, transforming itself in the direction of giving momentum to the nationalist tendency, the paper concluded.

articles.title: Hillary's Deeds Do Not Agree with Her Words: Chinese Paper
articles.content:
Hillary's Deeds Do Not Agree with Her Words: Chinese Paper
						
 Beijing, September 14 (KCNA) -- Beijing Daily of China recently carried an article titled "Everybody should see through the real intention of Hillary whose deeds do not agree with her words".
					 The U.S. secretary of State made remarks pleasant to the ear of China in her recent visit to it, the paper said, ridiculing that she seemed to forget she spoke ill of China by using such words as "mean" and "arbitrary".
					
					 The paper urged its readers not to be taken in by the honeyed words of the U.S. politicians.
					
					 It is the U.S. interests to protect its hegemony, the paper said, adding:
					
					 After the demise of the Cold War, the U.S. tried hard to retain its position as "the eldest brother" by ceaselessly tapping all natural resources and strength.
					
					 All those countries that looked like "potential enemies" were subject to merciless sanctions and attack.
					
					 The U.S. did not hesitate to launch several wars for meeting its interests. It has always been behind small and big regional conflicts and international disputes.
					
					 The U.S. has found itself self-contradictory in its relations with China, the paper said, adding it is not odd that the deeds of U.S. politicians do not agree with their words.
					
					 The paper urged people not to harbor any illusion about them, stressing that it is most important to keep to their own roads.

articles.title: Sincerity in Time of Need: Media of China
articles.content:
Sincerity in Time of Need: Media of China
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Mass media of China conveyed the news that Chinese workers were saved from a critical condition thanks to the noble sense of internationalist obligation and warm loving care of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					 The Chinese paper People's Daily on Friday carried an article titled "Sincerity in time of need". 
					
					 The paper said that Kim Jong Un sent two planes to rescue the Chinese workers in 13 days. This injected completely fresh warmth into the Chinese people working in the DPRK, it said, giving a detailed account of what happened. 
					
					 It recalled that even under hard conditions peoples of the two countries helped each other, deepening the friendship. 
					
					 A Chinese official who experienced the warm loving care of Kim Jong Un said that the supreme leader of the DPRK sent two planes to rescue the Chinese workers, adding that they were deeply touched by this. 
					
					 Xinhua News, Xinhua network of its Internet website conveyed the same news on Sept. 12.

articles.title: Cuerpo de Agregados Militare visita zona del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Cuerpo de Agregados Militare visita zona del monte Paektu
						
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 52o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea realizo del dia 12 al 14 una visita a la zona del monte Paektu.
					En el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon, los miembros del citado cuerpo rindieron el postumo homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar un cesto de flores al pie de su estatua de bronce y pasaron revista a dicho Conjunto Monumental.
					
					Tambien visitaron la casa natal (isba modesta) del Dirigente en el campamento secreto en el monte Paektu.
					
					Escuchando las explicaciones sobre dicha casa, recorrieron los objetos historicos de isba.
					
					Hassan Reza Husseini, agregado militar de la Embajada de la Republica Islamica de Iran en Corea, quien preside dicho cuerpo, escribio en el libro de visitas que para el fue un honor visitar la isba de la Comandancia Suprema donde realizo trabajo el Presidente y la casa natal del Dirigente en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu. Anadio que a traves de la visita llego a conocer mas bien sobre la historia revolucionaria de los grandes hombres.
					
					El agregado militar chino Zhang Ping destaco:
					
					El campamento secreto del monte Paektu es un lugar sagrado de la revolucion.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il cultivo la audacia sin par y la inteligencia experimentando las arduas pruebas de la enconada guerra antijaponesa.
					
					El crecio como un gran revolucionario escuchando detonaciones de fusiles y canones de la lucha antijaponesa.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos luchan con dinamismo manifestando el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu. 
					
					Estoy convencido de que el pueblo coreano logre grandes exitos en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Los miembros del cuerpo subieron al Paektu, sagrado monte de la revolucion. 
					
					En la cima del monte, ellos disfrutaron de aspecto majestuoso del monte y el panorama conmovedor de la orilla del lago Chon y cordilleras.
					
					Culminado el recorrido, el agregado militar ruso Dmitri Zheleznikov senalo que el monte Paektu es el lugar significativo donde esta grabada la historia de la revolucion coreana y anadio que bajo la guia del Presidente los combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses desplegaron la energica lucha armada contra la gobernacion colonial del imperialismo japones.
					
					Le Duy Long, agregado militar vietnamita expreso su admiracion sobre el grandioso paisaje del monte Paektu. 
					
					Ademas ellos visitaron el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Rimyongsu, el Museo Paektu, el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Samjiyon, la casa cultural del distrito de Samjiyon, etc.

articles.title: Efectuada ceremonia de inicio de obra de edificio de zona economica
articles.content:
Efectuada ceremonia de inicio de obra de edificio de zona economica
						
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en el terreno una ceremonia de inicio de la obra del edificio del Comite de Administracion de la Zona Economica de Hwanggumphyong para el desarrollo y la administracion comunes de Corea y China.
					Asistieron a la ocasion el vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Hong Kil Nam y otros funcionarios de la citada provincia y la ciudad de Sinuiju, por la parte coreana y por la china, el subgobernador de la provincia de Liaoning, Bing Zhigang, y otros miembros concernientes de la provincia y la ciudad de Dandong.
					
					En la ceremonia hubo discursos.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a que los Maximos Dirigentes de los dos paises llegaron a un acuerdo historico de desarrollar y administrar en comun las dos zonas economicas.
					
					Subrayaron que luego, ya fueron solucionados muchos asuntos para el desarrollo de la zona economica de Hwanggumphyong y entro en la etapa real de exploracion.
					
					Enfatizaron que el desarrollo y la administracion comunes de referida zona economica por ambas partes contribuiran a poner en una nueva etapa elevada las relaciones de amistad Corea-China enlazadas con sangre y contribuiran a lograr la prosperidad de  los dos  paises.
					
					Seguidamente, se establecio una lapida del inicio de la obra del edificio del Comite de Administracion de la Zona Economica de Hwanggumphyong.

articles.title: Parque Folklorico de Pyongyang transmite meritos de militares
articles.content:
Parque Folklorico de Pyongyang transmite meritos de militares
						
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el Parque Folklorico de Pyongyang en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Este museo de la historia al aire libre construido en el solar amplio del contorno de las ruinas del Palacio Real Anhak del monte Taesong, posibilita ver y experimentar directamente la historia y las costumbres nacionales de Corea.
					
					  Alli estan grabadas las proezas laborales de los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  Los objetos de construccion de dicho parque con el solar de cientos hectareas llegan totalmente a mas de 270 y los subdivididos son mas de 690.
					
					  Aunque son inmensos los objetos de construccion, un destacamento militar puso en pleno manifiesto la potencia espiritual de las masas militares con el espiritu de materializar a toda costa la orden del Comandante Supremo del EPC, Kim Jong Un, y asi cumplio excelentemente las tareas de obra.
					
					  Aprendieron el metodo de repello y estudiaron varios modos de construccion con la decision patriotica de encargarse tanto de la defensa de la patria y como de la construccion socialista.
					
					  En cada lugar de obra como cavadura de cimiento, evacuacion de la tierra, obra de carretera de decenas de ries (10 ries equivalen a 4 kilometros), crearon y aplicaron mas de cien nuevos metodos de obra para elevar la velocidad de construccion.
					
					  Formaron el mapa coreano de gran tamano acumulando la cantidad de tierra de mas de 40 mil metros cubicos y terminaron la obra de armazon de cientos edificios dificiles de construir dentro de 4 meses incluyendo el montaje de armadura del Monumento a la Idea Juche.
					
					  Los militares encargados del objeto de la pagoda del templo Kumgang, maqueta uno a uno, introdujeron el metodo de construccion con prefabricados y nuevos equipos y produjeron cerca de 17 mil piezas prefabricadas en el corto plazo, de manera que abrieron la perspectiva para poder anticipar la obra.
					
					  El Comandante Supremo dirigio sobre el terreno varias veces el lugar de construccion del Parque Folklorico de Pyongyang, en que aclaro en detalles la direccion y los remedios para la construccion inclusive el asunto de construir los edificios conforme al principio historicista y al gusto contemporaneo.
					
					  El oficial, Kwon Hyong Sik (59 anos de edad) dijo a la ACNC que gracias a la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y el indoblegable espiritu de lucha de los militares, el parque folklorico se levanto magnificamente como creacion monumental de la epoca del Songun.

articles.title: Tifon no.16 acarreara viento fuerte, lluvia torrencial y marejada
articles.content:
Tifon no.16 acarreara viento fuerte, lluvia torrencial y marejada
						
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El tifon no.16 se mueve hacia la direccion nornoroeste del Mar Sur de Corea con velocidad de 22km/h.
					La presion atmosferica central y la velocidad maxima del viento del tifon, que se localiza hasta las 6:00 del dia 15 en el mar sureste de la isla Okinawa, son 905hPa y 53m/s, respectivamente.
					
					Tambien cuenta con la zona de 240km de su radio con mas de 25m/s de velocidad y la otra de 600km de su radio con mas de 15m/s de velocidad.
					
					El tifon llegara a los contornos de Ryosu de la provincia de Jolla del Sur y pasara la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea. Se movera a eso de las 09:00 del dia 18 hacia las cercanias del territorio litoral de Rusia atravesando el mar frente a Chongjin.
					
					Debido a este fenomeno natural, caeran en la noche del dia 16 las lluvias en las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y del Norte, de Hamgyong del Sur y de Kangwon, y los dias 17 y 18 en la mayoria de las localidades del pais. Se preve que tambien en muchas zonas costeras este y oeste hara viento de mas de 10m/s en cierto tiempo y de mas de 15m/s parcialmente.
					
					Las precipitaciones se registraran 50-100mm y mas de 150mm parcialmente en algunas zonas de la costa del Mar Este y de la provincia de Hwanghae del  Sur; 40-70mm en la ciudad de Pyongyang, las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, de Hwanghae del Norte y de Ryanggang, y 10-30mm en las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte y de Jagang.
					
					Los dias 17 y 18, en el Mar Este de Corea hara  viento fuerte del noreste con la velocidad de 15-20m/s y 25m/s al maximo. Las alturas de las oleadas seran 4-6 metros. Y ademas se pronostica que habra la marejada de 80-120cm en la costa del Mar Este de Corea.
